Address.label: Address
Address.value: 762 WEST LANCASTER AVENUE, BRYN MAWR, Pennsylvania, 19010-3489, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Essential Utilities is a Pennsylvania-based holding company for U.S. water, wastewater, and natural gas distribution utilities. The company's water business serves 3 million people in eight states. Nearly three fourths of its water earnings come from Pennsylvania, primarily suburban Philadelphia. It also has a small market-based water business that provides water and water services to third parties, notably natural gas producers. Its $4.3 billion Peoples Gas acquisition that closed in March 2020 adds 750,000 gas distribution customers in Pennsylvania, West Virginia, and Kentucky.
